item.title: New paper: Initial discussions of ChatGPT in education-related subreddits
item.description: There’s a good bit of good news coming in the next few weeks, and I wanted to kick things off my highlighting a new publication that just came out in the Journal of Research on Technology in Education: “Initial discussions of ChatGPT in education-related subreddits” (DOI:10.
